sn22.97:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.97:1.3: “atthi nu kho, bhante, kinci rupam yam rupam niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam sassatisamam tatheva thassati?
sn22.97:1.4: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kaci vedana ya vedana nicca dhuva sassata aviparinamadhamma sassatisamam tatheva thassati?
sn22.97:1.5: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kaci sanna …pe…
sn22.97:1.6: keci sankhara, ye sankhara nicca dhuva sassata aviparinamadhamma sassatisamam tatheva thassanti?
sn22.97:1.7: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kinci vinnanam, yam vinnanam niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam sassatisamam tatheva thassati”ti?
sn22.97:1.8: “Natthi kho, bhikkhu, kinci rupam, yam rupam niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam sassatisamam tatheva thassati.
sn22.97:1.12: kinci vinnanam, yam vinnanam niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam sassatisamam tatheva thassati”ti.
sn22.97:2.1: Atha kho bhagava parittam nakhasikhayam pamsum aropetva tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn22.97:2.2: “ettakampi kho, bhikkhu, rupam natthi niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam sassatisamam tatheva thassati.
sn22.97:2.3: Ettakancepi, bhikkhu, rupam abhavissa niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam, nayidam brahmacariyavaso pannayetha samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn22.97:2.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhu, ettakampi rupam natthi niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam, tasma brahmacariyavaso pannayati samma dukkhakkhayaya”.
sn22.97:3.1: Ettakapi kho, bhikkhu, vedana natthi nicca dhuva sassata aviparinamadhamma sassatisamam tatheva thassati.
sn22.97:3.2: Ettaka cepi, bhikkhu, vedana abhavissa nicca dhuva sassata aviparinamadhamma, na yidam brahmacariyavaso pannayetha samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn22.97:3.3: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhu, ettakapi vedana natthi nicca dhuva sassata aviparinamadhamma, tasma brahmacariyavaso pannayati samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn22.97:4.2: ettakapi kho, bhikkhu, sankhara natthi nicca dhuva sassata aviparinamadhamma sassatisamam tatheva thassanti.
sn22.97:4.3: Ettaka cepi, bhikkhu, sankhara abhavissamsu nicca dhuva sassata aviparinamadhamma, na yidam brahmacariyavaso pannayetha samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn22.97:4.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhu, ettakapi sankhara natthi nicca dhuva sassata aviparinamadhamma, tasma brahmacariyavaso pannayati samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn22.97:5.1: Ettakampi kho, bhikkhu, vinnanam natthi niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam sassatisamam tatheva thassati.
sn22.97:5.2: Ettakampi kho, bhikkhu, vinnanam abhavissa niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam, na yidam brahmacariyavaso pannayetha samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn22.97:5.3: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhu, ettakampi vinnanam natthi niccam dhuvam sassatam aviparinamadhammam, tasma brahmacariyavaso pannayati samma dukkhakkhayaya.
